0.title: Calphalon Blender
0.description: The Calphalon Auto-Speed Blender senses the mixture in the jar and automatically adjusts power to maintain blade speed for perfectly blended results. Dual-direction blades and a 1,100-watt motor easily pulverize the contents. The 2-liter Tritan jar is dishwasher. An All-Metal Drive delivers reliable durability and a digital interface provides intuitive control. The included Blend-N-Go smoothie cup lets you add ingredients and blend inside the 25-oz. cup, then take it with you.

1.title: Smart Watch Band
1.description: For Apple Watch Band 42mm/38mm/44mm/40mm: Top stainless steel mesh loop apple watch strap for iWatch Sports Edition series 3 2 1. One Year Warranty for apple watch milanese loop. Feel free to contact for any quality issues.
